Name: What A Ball
About the game: WAB What A Ball - A different kind of ball racing games. Follow Blue's adventure running against MORE THAN 600 Balls racing together. Be the Ball: Crash, jump, bounce and run up to 300 Km per hour. It's very challenging and hardcore game, if don't believe us, just try it. Enjoy the epic story about Blue, get the higher score and find extra bonuses when you finish the story. In this one player game you will find beutiful minimalistic stages full of color. And don't forget the sound On. Easy controls: WASD to move(don't hold keys), Space to Jump, Mouse to turn view.
